name: Thomas P. SWEENEY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE and Department of Corrections, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Sweeney v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Thomas P. SWEENEY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE and Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of December, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
840 A.2d 990
Thomas P. SWEENEY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE and Department of Corrections, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 3, 2003.
